title: Forum slow?
content:
Hi all,

I've noticed that this board seems to have *really* slowed down over time, so much so that it can take me up to a minute to move to another page.

When trying to trace the problem, I discovered that the forum links to a couple of what appear to be tracer images on http://www.ripon.edu/students/cruzb/ - no doubt left over from the early days on the forum.

I used Adblock in Firefox to block "http://www.ripon.edu/students/cruzb/*" and wow, the forum is *instant* now! I just thought I'd let anyone else know that if the forum is running slowly for them too, this seems to help significantly.[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]

title: Re: Forum slow?
content:
That must be where the nifty table header images and such were stored when the forum saw a half-arsed and short-lived make over a few years ago.

Someone with admin privileges want to fix that, and maybe link up a replacement graphic so we can have some of that shininess back?

title: Re: Forum slow?
content:
Thanks for the tip. You're right - things ARE a lot faster now. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
Oh, and [url=http://www.tengusoft.net/]Team[/url].
